descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Josh Jackson dishes to Cade Cunningham, who connects on his 3-pointer from the corner.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham knocks down corner triple) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham knocks down corner triple

videos.description: James Harden thinks he has an easy layup, but Jerami Grant flies in to swat the shot away.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Grant rejects Harden from behind) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Grant rejects Harden from behind

videos.description: Blake Griffin gets the ball down low and finishes strong for the hoop and the harm vs. his former team.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD feeds Griffin for and-1 bucket) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD feeds Griffin for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Cade Cunningham drives past James Harden to score down low.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cunningham takes it to Harden for bucket inside) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cunningham takes it to Harden for bucket inside

videos.description: James Harden drills a 3-pointer over Kelly Olynyk to increase the Nets' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden's 3-ball forces a Pistons timeout) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden's 3-ball forces a Pistons timeout

videos.description: James Harden lets the ball roll into the backcourt without touching it, and Saddiq Bey swoops in to steal it away and dunk it home.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (What is James Harden doing on this egregious blunder?) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: What is James Harden doing on this egregious blunder?

videos.description: Josh Jackson strips James Harden, but misses his open dunk and Kevin Durant hits a 3 on the other end.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Josh Jackson botches wide-open dunk) 2021/11/05 ESHEET

videos.headline: Josh Jackson botches wide-open dunk
